root.name: Elevation Map
root.description: View a single channel of a 2D image as a 3D elevation map (X,Y,Intensity).
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2016-05-23 15:53:28
Updated to Icy 1.8 (new 3D rendering engine). The plug-in should run much faster/smoother now
- Version 2.3.1.0 Date 2016-02-11 13:49:00
Display a more "user-friendly" message if VTK is not initialised properly (mostly linux)
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2014-07-11 12:12:45
* New: the viewer now listens to change on the original data. Can be useful to visualise live changing data (e.g. from a microscope) * Fixed a few memory leaks
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2014-05-20 15:36:31
Updated to Icy 1.5 with VTK 6
- Version 2.1.2.0 Date 2014-05-12 23:57:48
Fixed issue when switching channels
- Version 2.1.1.0 Date 2014-01-30 11:41:43
Display a warning message when VTK is not found
- Version 2.1.0.1 Date 2013-11-07 15:03:21
Updated to Icy 1.4 (no change)
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2013-07-23 17:04:38
* Speed optimization * Mouse interaction imitates the 2D viewer * Tooltip message with instructions * Screenshot support
- Version 2.0.0.1 Date 2013-07-23 10:12:37
Re-uploaded jar file (seemed to have issues).
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2013-07-19 17:59:50
Rewrote the plugin => now an image canvas, to be more accessible, usable, and fast
